TopicTitle: Devnote Tuesdays: The "Notice My Bug Report, Senpai" Edition

Articles.Content:
I assume you don't even bother with the Stayputnik probe then. Putting even an antenna on that thing can be infuriating. I just get it as close as possible and call it done.

Or maybe you put 2 of everything on it?

Pretty much.

Secret feature for 0.25; Stayputnik probe now has size 0 stack top node

You know, I might add one just because it would be so satisfying. Instead I made my own probe.
I'm late on the wagon, but would still like to express my approval for the new tone on the Devnotes.

THEY ARE ALMOST HERE!!!!!!!

I'm excited

7:13 PM EST Here.

Should be right about.... NOW!

EDIT:

Durnit, my future prediction powers are off today. No devnotes yet.
The devnotes usually show up around 9:00 PM EST as far as I can tell, sometimes earlier though. If I go to sleep early they're practically Devnote Wednesdays...
Don't click caps lock just yet, folks! The devnotes are going to be late today and they're also going to be super short for reasons explained in the notes.

Don't click caps lock just yet, folks! The devnotes are going to be late today and they're also going to be super short for reasons explained in the notes.

Obviously, they're going to be super short because the 0.25 release is tomorrow! Yeah!

denial? what denial?
Im really looking forward to the next few updates. Looks like SQUAD are stepping it up! i would like sperlunking in 0.27 please

Don't click caps lock just yet, folks! The devnotes are going to be late today and they're also going to be super short for reasons explained in the notes.

Hmm... short? Short. What is short, and could be included in KSP?

Cutscenes? Moar Kerbals?

SQUASHA- whoops, caps lock . Squashable (deformable) parts?

(Just being silly, folks, nothing to see here.)

Obviously, they're going to be super short because the 0.25 release is tomorrow! Yeah!

denial? what denial?

I hope they release 0.25 tomorrow lol

I hope they release 0.25 tomorrow lol

Yea, release tomorrow before experimentals so we can "test" it!

Don't click caps lock just yet, folks! The devnotes are going to be late today and they're also going to be super short for reasons explained in the notes.

Uh, how late, like an hour or a day?

Uh, how late, like an hour or a day?

late today

Hey, I think we all appreciate the ahem...size of the devnotes the past few weeks. Obviously it can not always be like that, but I truly appreciate you taking our previous feedback into consideration, and increasing the devnote-yness of the devnotes.

late today

Yeah, I saw that but I interpreted it as "today's notes are going to be late". It's all in the tone of voice which isn't present lol.

Don't click caps lock just yet, folks! The devnotes are going to be late today and they're also going to be super short for reasons explained in the notes.

http://uncapslock.com/
Also, SQUAD's time zone means most users get a devnote Wednesday anyways.
Squad=Awesome. I don't think we ought to worry. The devnotes are probably short for the best reason ever!
I always look forward to reading them in the morning when I go to Java class
